response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's an investment that can significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its exceptional features and capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $1,200,000. However, for the sake of negotiation, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This is an opportunity to acquire a cutting-edge solution at a highly competitive rate. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any way I can assist you in making a decision.", "product_price": 1100000}
